description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国河北省邯郸市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Handan, Hebei province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的多数民族，也是全世界人口最多的族群。
description.en: The majority ethnic group in China and the most populous ethnic group in the world.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党领导。
description.en: A country in East Asia led by the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第十三届国家最高权力机关。
description.en: The 13th term of the highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的五个自治区之一。
description.en: One of the five autonomous regions of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.
Wen Shugang is from Linzhang, Hebei.
Wen Shugang's ethnicity is Han Chinese.

description.zh-cn: 温枢刚是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Wen Shugang is a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 2018年，温枢刚被选为广西壮族自治区出席第十三届全国人民代表大会的代表。
description.en: In 2018, Wen Shugang was elected as a deputy to the 13th National People's Congress, representing the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.
